cause.description:
WE NEED TO GET AS MANY SIGNATIRES AS POSSIBLE BY SEPTEMBER 1ST 2007 TO TAKE TO OUR LOCAL ABORTION CLINIC TO STOP ABORTIONS IN OUR CITY. AFTER THAT WE WILL TAKE THE SAME PETITION TO OUR PROVINCIAL GOVERNMENT AND FEDERAL AS WELL. THANKS FOR YOUR HELP AND SUUPORT WITH THIS SERIOUSLY IMPORTANT CAUSE.
1. A FETUS IS A DEFENSELESS PERSON
2. ABORTION IS WRONG
3. SAFE SEX IS SUPER
cause.name: Anti- abortion
